author: safa0182
content: Hello, I want to collect a dataset for the activities of validators. For each activity, I would like to know the value of gas consumed as well as the resources consumed to succeed, and also the degree of activity of the network. My goal is to estimate the value needed for each task. I would like to know if this idea makes sense or not.

author: sproul
content: validators don't pay gas for any of their activities (attesting, producing blocks, producing sync committee messages, etc)

author: sproul
content: withdrawals are also gas-less, and so are exits/slashings/address change messages. It's all "free"
